product_name: The North Face Horizon Breeze Brimmer Hat
long_description: Featuring a wide brim for extra shade during all your outdoor pursuits, the Horizon Breeze Brimmer Hat from The North Face keeps you covered and comfortable with lightweight, breathable fabric. Ripstop polyester fabric features built-in UPF 50+ sun protection. Hat features mesh paneling with fabric overlays to promote ventilation; interior terry headband keeps sweat out of your eyes. The North Face Horizon Breeze Brimmer Hat features an adjustable, removable drawcord.
short_description: Featuring a wide brim for extra shade during all your outdoor pursuits, the Horizon Breeze Brimmer Hat from The North Face keeps you covered and comfortable with lightweight, breathable fabric.
